sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The travels of the Patriarchs.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for William Miller at the Gilded Acorn in St. Paul's Church-Yard, near the little North-Door, London : 1680.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Printed in double columns. With a two-line bookseller's advertisement at foot. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
